name: technician

effect.black_white: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.
effect.black_2_white_2: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.

short_effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.black_white: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
